list_of_reviews.review_title: waiting for a month and will be forever…
list_of_reviews.review: waiting for a month and will be forever to refund 😭  the support seem polite, but their conversation going nowhere . just miss the tag/memo on this ton deposit and provide all the proofs for them. but after a month they shutdown the ticket and reply that they don't say when the refund is concluded 😭. so bad for a promising exchangehash: 6f60e1040c60ab1c4dae6ce93bf92e101ac6f6fe8e59d4116c3cfea2a944773a
Poor customer support, cannot withdraw funds, app and website confusing to use. Trust me, don't waste time and enegry using this company platform

list_of_reviews.review_title: Scammers in P2P section as they will…
list_of_reviews.review: Scammers in P2P section as they will held your crypto to the last minute then mark as paid so you cannot take your money back and try to scam it, and the okx support are helping them by not reading the chat of the buyer that refuse to pay via the method that they said in the title.

As others have mentioned this company is definitely a scam. I was on Coinbase and opened an account on OKX as Coinbase did not work with my wallet.As soon as my funds came into the account, OKX locked my account and started asking for all kinds of verification without giving any reason. This was within 2 days of opening the account. Do yourself a favor and stay away. Find another exchange to trust with your money and tokens.

Compared to other exchanges I've used, OKX stands out as the best in terms of technology and customer support. I've encountered some challenging situations with OKX, but when I reached out to them, I received the assistance I needed. Even though I wasn't entirely satisfied with the outcome, they made an effort to be as objective and informative as possible. I commend the team, but I recommend improving the KYC tools.

Beware! Never open up an account with OKX! You will have a lot of hazzle only, because their customer service does not work anymore. OKX suspends your account and asks for verification all of a sudden with no apparent reason. Maybe because they got hacked a few months ago?I can't use their QR-Code link for renewal of the verification, since I do not have a smartphone. I could open up an account and fund it - without smartphone, but now, I can't renew verification anymore without a smartphone?They do no longer accept verification by email or computer. But even when friends help out with a smartphone, OKX system does not work either. I only get error messages like: "verfication failed" or "selfie does not match passport". I had more than twenty failed  attempts to do the verfication that way. Customer support first promised to send me a specified jumio email link for verification, but then they withdrew and just emailed me: "Try again". This is no support, this is customer mobbing!

list_of_reviews.review_title: SHOULD BE A SCAM FROM THERE LEVEL OR PROFESSIONALISM
list_of_reviews.review: THESE PEOPLE WILL HOLD YOUR COINS HOSTAGE MAKE YOU VERFIY AND THEN NOT EVEN ALLOW YOU TO TRADE THOSE COINS BECAUSE OF A REASON THEY WONT EXPLAIN. VERY POOR SERVICE AND CUSTOMER CARE. PLEASE AVIOD

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX is my favourite crypto exchange
list_of_reviews.review: OKX is my favourite crypto exchange. I've been using it for many years and it keeps getting better. Recently they integrated iDEAL which allows me to buy crypto basically for free.

This company is a scam and worked with a company called smm limited. I tried to withdraw 3500.00 from my wallet and they asked me to pay 1750.00 to show i am legitimate  once I had done that they asked me for a further 4200.00 which buy this stage I made further investigations and I did not pay as I realize its a scam. I contacted the FCA and Action Fraud who confirmed my suspicions. the names to look out for our Anthony, Lucy White and Lucas Graf Claims to be OKX. I would advise anybody against crypto companies or people claiming to get your money back they are all fraudsters. SMM limited have now taken down there website (What a Surprise) I have only lost a small amount but I have now met people or spoken to them who have lost over £50000 and I mean well over. The strange thing is okx don't even have a phone number that you can contact and how can they be the 3rd main sponsor of Manchester City. Please be warned.

Terrible Company with Arrogant Customer Service…. My Account has been hijacked and they refuse to Unlock my Withdraw or return my money. Tread lightly with this platform. They tell you that they comply with Government Regulations and Federal Reserve Policy which is all a Scam.

Worst KYC support ever. You give them everything they want and even more, and they still cant approve your account due to an error. So incompetent, probably even selling your info as we speak. Im running away from this shady Exchange.7 times retried my KYC, still rejected.
When making a deposit to OKX.com they hijack your money for 5 days. No withdrawals, no transfers. Also USDT trading pairs are no longer available for EU customers.
As mentioned by many others, same issue, frozen my account with funds blocked without any explanation. Support gives only generic responses, don't waste your time.

Terrible exchange. I did everything they asked me to comply by their regulations.  I made a copy of my ID , a picture of myself with my ID, a copy of my bank account,  all the details how I saved the amount of money I was depositing. And then they blocked my deposit as I was a fraudster or scammer. But of course I had to understand that blocking my account is for my own good and safety, right??! GO F. YOURSELVES  OKX!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account frozen once they did Australian…
list_of_reviews.review: Account frozen once they did Australian migration. This has been second time. They did that before because they wanted a quick response for sanction form. For any compliance things, their quick fix is to freeze customer accounts. The management looks quite incompetent in handling account matters. Don’t think they understand what it means to freeze someone’s account without written notices and warnings. Their parent company already verified me before and now with Aussie migration they are re-verifying everyone in Australia with an excuse that’s its regulatory requirement. Why couldn’t do pre-migration! Incompetence at its heights. Don’t waste you time. This exchange will surprise you!

Good platform with verificated users, any problem can be resolved with support what is working 24/7 its best  place for p2p trading, but be careful and work only with vereficated supermerchants and check how much they did deals at last 30 days with 96% its okay if lower here you must make double check. Gold rule same name for profile and bank account its must be same for 100% in other case is can be scam. Wasnt problems with that platform

list_of_reviews.review_title: There is no good support on the…
list_of_reviews.review: There is no good support on the official platform. When there are questions about the services or any type of problem such as account theft, they only respond to emails with already prepared texts.I tried to contact someone from support in other ways but there are many impostors. I wanted to make a report by email and they only responded that my account was closed due to suspicious actions. For more information see the terms x.x. Customer service is almost non-existent and they take no action to prevent problems

Account has been frozen, and not one support person will speak to me, I've verified my account months ago, prior to new regulations incoming in Australia. Now I'm frozen and the system wants me to close positiona and do tasks I'm not able to while it's frozen, I'm widowed mum about to take her first holiday with my son, days no response and can't get my money to pay for rest of our plans...RUINED! RUINED RUINED!

I started with them ten days ago. Only bad experiences. First, they released my USDT to a buyer who clicked "paid" and didn't pay. I fighted to them one week until they returned my crypto into my account. Second, then I tried to withdrawall my USDT to other platform, as last step was they asked me for authentification code, but they never sent it to me. I contacted the support but they done nothing. Also they modified my login password and for reset it, you need again an authentification code wich they never send. Absolutely scammers.
excelente exchange mas de 200.000 negociados en p2p y todo bien. excelente servicio al cliente.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews primarily highlight advancements in technology, with a strong focus on the integration of AI and NFTs, indicating a trend towards innovation in the blockchain space. Market growth is another key theme, with discussions centered on staking mechanisms and updates on ecosystem developments, suggesting a community keen on exploring new avenues for investment and engagement. Community news, including project introductions and strategies for resilience, reflects an active and adaptive community that values transparency and collaboration. However, there is a lack of discussion on regulatory governance, which could be an area for further investigation, as it is crucial for the long-term stability and legitimacy of blockchain projects. Additionally, the absence of market predictions suggests a potential gap in forward-looking analysis that could benefit investors seeking to understand future trends and prepare for market shifts.
